duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver operational instruction and field applications-based content to new customers to prepare them to use the MX908.
Develop and execute field training curriculum following a manufacturer-certified curriculum.
Deliver training remotely and in person, conduct demonstrations, and prepare operations plans for training projects.
Perform service checks on devices, complete device troubleshooting and repair devices in the field.
Shadow customers and provide feedback on proper device usage.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience. Professional instructor certification preferred.
